alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 16 at 9:46AM CDT until April 18 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Excessive rainfall is causing rises along Village Creek. This may lead to flooding of low-lying and roadways near Avenue West in Ensley and Pratt City. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following county, Jefferson. * WHEN...Until 1245 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying areas near Avenue West in Ensley and near the Water Treatment Plant in Ensley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 946 AM CDT, gauge reports indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 2.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Valley Creek, Black Creek and Village Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Western Birmingham and Ensley.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
